itemDisplayName: Create an IoT Hub and a Storage account, then create and send messages to the IoT Hub and see the results route to storage automatically.
description: This template enables you to deploy an IoT Hub and a storage account, and automatically route hub messages to the storage account.
summary: This template creates an IoT Hub and a storage account and shows automatic routing.

tags.resource: Azure Iot Hub, Iot Hub, Resource Manager, Resource Manager templates, ARM templates
